name: Mighty Space Rocks
description: My very first game! Instructions and how to play are on the main menu. Shoot asteroids and enemy ships to win! Powerups will drop from destroying them. Coded using GML in Game Maker Studio 2. Coded along with FriendlyCosmonaut's tutorial on YouTube, so big thanks to her and YoYo Games! All assets in the game were made by me, with exception to the music, which was provided by FriendlyCosmonaut. YouTube link to tutorial used:
